name: Manual Override
description:
Manual Override is a resource management survival game that leaves you alone in the cockpit of a spaceship with an instruction manual. Everything you need to know is in the manual that's been written by the most incompetent writers. Seriously, reading through the manual takes a whole lot of patience. How long will you be able to survive under these conditions?

---

This is a submission to the GMTK 2020 - "Out of Control" Game Jam. 

---
